data.title: Analysis of J Dilla's Rhythmic Patterns
data.abstract: This paper analyzes the unique swing feel in J Dilla's production, typically ranging from 88 BPM to 98 BPM with heavy syncopation.

data.title: Computational Analysis of Drum Patterns
data.abstract: A machine learning approach to drum pattern analysis at 120 BPM.

arxiv_response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:arxiv="http://arxiv.org/schemas/atom">
  <entry>
    <id>http://arxiv.org/abs/2023.12345</id>
    <title>Neural Networks for Drum Pattern Generation</title>
    <summary>We present a neural network approach for generating realistic drum patterns at tempos between 80 BPM and 160 BPM.</summary>
    <author><name>Robert Chen</name></author>
    <author><name>Maria Garcia</name></author>
    <published>2023-06-15T00:00:00Z</published>
  </entry>

title: Rhythmic Complexity in Jazz Drumming
items.abstract: An analysis of jazz drummers including patterns at 140 BPM and 180 beats per minute.
